Deutsche Schülerakademie

Written on 2015-03-01

The Deutsche Schuelerakademie is an organization that runs acedemies for highly gifted children. These academies take place in the summer school holidays and are 17 days long. In this time the pupils take part in courses tought by academics and have plenty of time to engage with the tutors and each other. I am an active supporter of this concept and have been involeved with these acedemies over the last years in different roles:

  • DSA Schulpforte 2011 - Course on web services with Rene Pickhardt.
  • DJA Meisenheim 2012 - Course on efficient algorithms Prof. Johann Baumeister
  • DJA Meisenheim 2013 - Academy Manager
  • DSA Torgelow 2015 - Academy Manager
